channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: And… cut! Nevada lawmakers narrowly reject plan to lure movie projects to Vegas
item.description: A seven-day special session wrapped in Nevada's capital with a major proposal to offer tax credits to film studios failing, and the governor's sweepin...

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Wednesday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Wednesday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 10-31-49-51-68, Powerball: 19

item.title: Vietnam War POW Robert Stirm, seen in 'Burst of Joy' photo with family, dies at 92
item.description: Former U.S. Air Force Lt. Col. Robert Stirm, a POW during the Vietnam War known for the iconic "Burst of Joy" photo reuniting him with his family, has...

item.title: Advocacy groups urge parents to avoid AI toys this holiday season
item.description: Children’s and consumer advocacy groups are urging parents not to buy AI-powered toys during the holiday season

item.title: New Hampshire top court takes up disputed verdict in landmark youth center abuse case
item.description: New Hampshire Supreme Court justices are considering a disputed verdict in a landmark lawsuit over abuse at the state’s youth detention center
